content: The Nvidia RTX 5070 reviews are very positive. Performance is great.
The Palit GeForce RTX 5070 has a sleek white design. I like the design.
The MSI GeForce RTX 5070 Gaming Trio OC has exceptional cooling.
The ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 5070 is a solid 1440p performer.
The ASUS PRIME GeForce RTX 5070 offers strong 4K performance.
The MSI GeForce RTX 5070 Ti Gaming Trio offers impressive 4K performance.
The MSI GeForce RTX 5070 has fantastic OC performance. I am impressed.
The RTX 5070 reviews are up and it performs worse than the 4090.
The Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 is a solid card for non-4K gaming.
The Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 Ti is great, especially with overclocking.
The Nvidia RTX 5070 Ti is a capable GPU for 4K gaming.
The MSI Vector A18 HX A9W laptop review says the GeForce RTX 5070 Ti is the way to go.
I've seen many negative reviews for the 5070.
The Colorful GeForce RTX 5070 Ti has enthusiast performance at $749.
The MSI GeForce RTX 5070 Gaming Trio OC Graphics Card is reviewed. I will check it out.
I was up all night finishing the 5070 Ti review. It was good times.
Nvidia might have driver issues, but I'd still buy an RTX 5070 Ti if the price was right.
I am waiting for the reviews to see how good the RTX 5070 will actually be. I've seen projections that it'll be much faster.
Nvidia doesn't care about gamers anymore the game has changed, so to speak.
The 5070 sucks because of its price. If it drops $100, we can talk.
Nvidia really didn't do a good job with the 5070 it's overpriced.
I'm feeling better that I didn't get a 5090.
The 5080 may be a 4080 Super with less stock and more scalping.
The 9070 kills the 5070 with better performance and similar RT, plus 16GB.
This generation is a flop with underwhelming performance and high prices.
This is easily the worst card of the release, unlike the 5070ti.
If I can get a 5070 FE at RRP, I'll be happy to upgrade from my 3060ti.
Even with FMG and DLSS, it can't beat a 4090 in latency.
Lack of competition leads to terrible prices and minimal performance jumps.
The 5060 series will barely be faster than last gen's cards.
This may be the worst GPU ever, with no uplift over the 4070 Super.
The 5070 shows great results if you overclock it, so stop crying.
Nothing justifies the existence of the 50xx series what's the point?
Nvidia is greedy, creating many tiers with marginal increases and premium prices.
